articles.description: England interim manager Lee Carsley strengthened his claims to be Gareth Southgate's permanent successor after a second straight win.

articles.description: BBC Sport explores the history of long-range goals in the Premier League and how data and tactics are shaping how often they're scored.
articles.title: Long range goals: Is shooting from outside the box a dying art in football?

articles.description: Stand by for another weekend of extreme golfing drama because the Solheim Cup is golf''s most dependable source of thrilling and feisty matchplay, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: US seek first win over Europe since 2017 in contest littered with controversy

articles.description: Former Tottenham and Chelsea boss Mauricio Pochettino is named as the new manager of the United States men's team.

articles.description: Captain Harry Kane will become just the 10th man to make 100 England appearances when the Three Lions face Finland in the Nations League at Wembley on Tuesday.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England striker set to make 100th international appearance

articles.description: Manchester City defender Nathan Ake is stretchered off during the Netherlands' Nations League draw with Germany in Amsterdam.
articles.title: Ake stretchered off in Netherlands draw with Germany

articles.description: Republic of Ireland defender Nathan Collins says that they are "sick" of losing after their 2-0 defeat against Greece in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Republic of Ireland: Hosts 'sick' of losing says Nathan Collins after Greece defeat

articles.description: The NFL said it is reviewing the latest sexual assault allegation made against Cleveland Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson.
articles.title: Deshaun Watson assault claims: NFL to review latest allegation made against quarterback quarterback

articles.description: The American football star was briefly detained before the Miami Dolphins' first match of the season.
articles.title: Tyreek Hill traffic stop video released by Miami police

articles.description: The Australian breakdancer is on top of the latest rankings despite her polarizing Olympic routine.
articles.title: Technicality gives Raygun top world breakdancing ranking
